topics: درس دوم: وارون ماتریس و دترمینان
question: حاصلجمع جوابهای معادلۀ $\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 & 1 \\ 1 & x+1 & -1 \\ -1 & x & 1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|=\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|$ کدام است؟
explanation: $\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 & 1 \\ 1 & x+1 & -1 \\ -1 & x & 1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|=\left( -1 \right)\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{4}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} -1 & 1 \\ x+1 & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|+x{{\left( -1 \right)}^{5}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & 1 \\ 1 & -1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|+1\times {{\left( -1 \right)}^{6}}\times \left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|$ $=-\left( 1-x-1 \right)-x\left( -x+1-1 \right)+\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|=\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|$ $\Rightarrow -\left( 1-x-1 \right)-x\left( -x+1-1 \right)=\underbrace{\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|-\left| \begin{matrix} x-1 & -1 \\ 1 & x+1 \\ \end{matrix} \right|}_{0}$ $\Rightarrow x+{{x}^{2}}=0\Rightarrow x\left( x+1 \right)=0\Rightarrow \left\{ \begin{matrix} x=0 \\ x=-1 \\ \end{matrix} \right.$ $0+\left( -1 \right)=-1$.
